examples: Government support will be essential if the project is to succeed.
There is essential work to be done before the building can be re-occupied.
Water is essential for/to living things.
It is essential (that) our prices remain competitive.
For the experiment to be valid, it is essential to record the data accurately.

body_content.explanation: relating to something's or someone's basic or most important qualities:
examples: I love the building as it is, and don't want to do anything to change its essential character.
She believes in the essential goodness of human beings.

body_content.explanation: a basic thing that you cannot live without:
examples: When we go on holiday, we only take the bare essentials.
This leaflet will give you the essentials of how to prepare for a hurricane.
Because I live in a remote village, I regard my car as an essential.

body_content.explanation: one of the basic or most important ideas or qualities in something:
examples: Her brilliance allowed her to distil any argument to its essentials.
This was his life story stripped down to its barest essentials.
